body: // template<typename T> using ordered_set = tree<T, null_type, less<T>, rb_tree_tag, tree_order_statistics_node_update>;
#define loop(i, n) for(int i=0; i<(int)n; i++)
#define loopi(i, k, n) for(int i=k; i<(int)n; i++)
#define loope(i, k, n) for(int i=k; i<=(int)n; i++)
template<typename T> inline void clr(T& x) { memset(x, 0, sizeof(x)); }
template <typename T> ostream &operator<<(ostream &out, const V<T> &v) { loop(i, v.size()) { out << v[i] << ' '; }; return out; }
template <typename T, typename Y> ostream &operator<<(ostream &out, const pair<T,Y> &v) { out << v.ff << ' ' << v.ss; return out; }
template <typename T> ostream &operator<<(ostream &out, const tuple<T,T,T> &v) { out << get<0>(v) << ' ' << get<1>(v) << ' ' << get<2>(v); return out; }
template <typename T> inline void print(const T &v) { cout << v << endl; }
template <typename T> inline void print(const V<T> &v, const int& s, const int& n) { loopi(i,s,n) { cout << v[i] << ' '; }; cout << endl; }
inline void print(const string &str, const int& s, const int& n) { loopi(i,s,n) { cout << str[i]; }; cout << endl; }
